resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/593042370</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>593042370</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14580</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Was haben diese Länder gemeinsam?</string>
            <string language="en">What do these countries share?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que ces pays partagent-ils ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que estes países compartilham?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa questi paesi ripartiscono?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι αυτές οι χώρες μοιράζονται;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué estos países comparten?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Dies ist eine Zuordnungsübung. Die Aufgabe besteht darin, geografische Gemeinsamkeiten, wie Gebirgsregionen, Meer, Halbinsel usw. den jeweiligen Ländern zuzuordnen.</string>
            <string language="en">This is a matching exercise, the task is to match groups of countries to their common features, such as mountain range, sea, peninsula etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Europäische Länder</string>
            <string language="en">European countries</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un exercice assorti, le charger doit apparier 
des groupes de pays à leurs dispositifs communs, tels que 
l'intervalle de montagne, la mer, la péninsule etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um exercício combinando, a tarefa deve combinar 
grupos dos países a suas características comuns, tais como a escala 
da montanha, o mar, a península etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'esercitazione di corrispondenza, l'operazione 
deve abbinare i gruppi dei paesi alle loro caratteristiche comuni, 
quali la gamma della montagna, il mare, la penisola ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ταιριάζοντας με άσκηση, η στοιχειώδης 
εργασία είναι να ταιριαχτούν με οι ομάδες χωρών τα κοινά 
χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματά τους, όπως η σειρά βουνών, η θάλασσα,
η χερσόνησος κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un ejercicio que corresponde con, la tarea debe 
corresponder con grupos de países a sus características comunes, 
tales como rango de la montaña, mar, península etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pays européens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Países europeus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paesi europei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρωπαϊκές χώρες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Países europeos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">14-19</string>
            <string language="en">14-19</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Dieses Lernobjekt soll das Allgemeinwissen über die Geografie Europas überprüfen. Es enthält Links zu Online-Landkarten und bietet nützliche sofortige Rückmeldungen für die Lernenden. Das Quiz kann in der Klasse als Informationsquelle, als Einführung in das Thema oder als Zusammenfassung eingesetzt werden. Unterrichtende können es entsprechend den Bedürfnissen ihrer SchülerInnen einsetzen.</string>
            <string language="en">This learning object is designed to check students’ general knowledge of the geography of Europe. It contains links to on-line maps and provides useful and immediate feedback for the learners. 
The quiz can be used in the classroom as a source of information, kind of  introduction to the subject or as a summing-up. The teacher can use it to suit their students’ needs.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc"><rdf:RDF xmlns="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"><Work rdf:about=""><license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/" /></Work><License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/"><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/DerivativeWorks" /><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice" /></License></rdf:RDF></string>
          </description>
        </rights>
